name: Diaspora: avatars as circles
description: Display avatars as circles (instead of rounded squares).
css:
@-moz-document domain("diasp.eu"),
domain("diaspora-fr.org"),
domain("sechat.org"),
domain("framasphere.org"),
domain("diasp.org"),
domain("joindiaspora.com"),
domain("pod.geraspora.de"),
domain("diasp.de"),
domain("despora.de"),
domain("calispora.org"),
domain("poddery.com"),
domain("londondiaspora.com"),
domain("wk3.org"),
domain("www.cryptospora.net"),
domain("ser.endipito.us"),
domain("ilikefreedom.org"),
domain("yaspora.com"),
domain("diasp.eu.com"),
domain("nesc.io"),
domain("pod.nocentre.net"),
domain("failure.net"),
domain("diaspora.re"),
domain("dipod.es"),
domain("social.deuxfleurs.fr"),
domain("podricing.org") {
 .avatar {
    border-radius: 100%;
  } 
}
